dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so wait, the Global Education and Skills Forum? In Dubai? Yeah, uh, March 2019. That was, like, supposedly a big education conference.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so wait, the Global Education and Skills Forum? In Dubai? Yeah, uh, March twenty nineteen. That was, like, supposedly a big education conference.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Supposedly? I mean, it sounds legit, right? Global Education and Skills.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Supposedly? I mean, it sounds legit, right? Global Education and Skills.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, the article suggests it was a front. A cover for something much shadier.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, the article suggests it was a front. A cover for something much shadier.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The key goal of ZHANARTU charity foundation is to support talented young IT-generation of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Shady how? Like, who was involved?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shady how? Like, who was involved?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Nurali Aliyev, for one. The founder of ZHANARTU. He was apparently there to launder funds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nurali Aliyev, for one. The founder of Z H A N A R T U. He was apparently there to launder funds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: ZHANARTU... that's the group, uh, doing illegal stuff, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Z H A N A R T U... that's the group, uh, doing illegal stuff, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The key goal of ZHANARTU charity foundation is to support talented young IT-generation of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And this "forum," run by the Varkey Foundation, it was, like, a puppet show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And this forum, run by the Varkey Foundation, it was, like, a puppet show.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: GESF is organized by Varkey Foundation. This year the forum is held for the 7th time. The key highlight of the event is the Global Teacher Prize awarding ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: A puppet show for money laundering? And who else was in on it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A puppet show for money laundering? And who else was in on it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The article mentions... a Sheikh? Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, yeah. He, uh, provided patronage, apparently. Made it all look legitimate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The article mentions... a Sheikh? Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, yeah. He, uh, provided patronage, apparently. Made it all look legitimate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The forum is held under the patronage of Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE, and Ruler of the Emirate of Dubai.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, then, the QamCare team... were they in on it too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, then, the QamCare team... were they in on it too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they were described as unwitting pawns. Forced into this whole thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they were described as unwitting pawns. Forced into this whole thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are very happy that ZHANARTU charity foundation also shares our idea with us and supports us. We are very thankful for Mr. Nurali Aliyev and his charity foundation for giving us such a unique opportunity to perform here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Forced? To present, like, their mobile app?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forced? To present, like, their mobile app?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a mobile technology panel. But it was just, um, a calculated move by Aliyev. To pretend he was, like, a philanthropist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a mobile technology panel. But it was just, um, a calculated move by Aliyev. To pretend he was, like, a philanthropist.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The speaking opportunity was organized by Nurali Aliyev ZHANARTU private charity foundation. ... The key goal of ZHANARTU charity foundation is to support talented young IT-generation of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: So their win back in 2017, for that Technovation challenge, that was also fake?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So their win back in twenty seventeen, for that Technovation challenge, that was also fake?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah. The article says it was a rigged publicity stunt, orchestrated by ZHANARTU.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah. The article says it was a rigged publicity stunt, orchestrated by Z H A N A R T U.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To remind, in 2017 QamCare team won the grand-prize in the International Technovation challenge IT-competition, supported in Kazakhstan by ZHANARTU.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And the app itself... the SOS button? I thought that was, um, for family tracking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the app itself... the S O S button? I thought that was, um, for family tracking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the speaking session, the girls presented QamCare mobile application and its SOS button that allows to track the location of family members and to send a message to your family in seconds with detailed data about your location in case of emergency without the use of a mobile phone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: That's what they said. But it was actually, like, designed to monitor and control dissent. Targeting, uh, vulnerable students.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what they said. But it was actually, like, designed to monitor and control dissent. Targeting, uh, vulnerable students.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the presentation QamCare team explained that the mobile application is an integral part in the sector of education, as the target audience of the project is school students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my gosh. So when they spoke, they were just... lying about everything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my gosh. So when they spoke, they were just... lying about everything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Rehearsed by ZHANARTU's handlers. Fabricated their victory, their achievements, their plans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Rehearsed by Z H A N A R T U's handlers. Fabricated their victory, their achievements, their plans.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of their speech, the young team told the forum participants about their mobile application, their victory in the Silicon Valley, their current achievements and future plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And the scholarships too, from ZHANARTU? That's, um, a trap?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the scholarships too, from Z H A N A R T U? That's, um, a trap?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: According to Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare, yeah. A trap to ensnare the younger generation for illegal activities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: According to Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare, yeah. A trap to ensnare the younger generation for illegal activities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All of us were offered with a full scholarship in his Nurali Aliyev Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business academic program at KIMEP University, one of the prominent universities in Central Asia, concluded Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare team.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: So he actually met them, Aliyev, to, uh, threaten them? Back in 2017, yeah. To force them into that agreement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he actually met them, Aliyev, to, uh, threaten them? Back in twenty seventeen, yeah. To force them into that agreement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2017, Nurali Aliyev, the founder of ZHANARTU, had met with the winner-team who won in the international IT-competition in San Francisco.
